definitions.definition: An instance of merrymaking; a celebration.
To make merry; to have a happy, lively time.
The outer side of a window or door frame; the jamb.
A revelation; an uncovering of what was hidden.
definitions.example: The comedian had been telling us about his sleep being disturbed by noise. Then came the reveal: he was sleeping on a bed in a department store.

definitions.definition: (obsolete in the US) The side of an opening for a window, doorway, or the like, between the door frame or window frame and the outer surface of the wall; or, where the opening is not filled with a door, etc., the whole thickness of the wall; the jamb.
